trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet
Set-wsmanquickconfig
Set-wsmanquickconfig
简述

trans-unit.source: Configures the local computer for remote management.
trans-unit.target: 配置本地计算机以进行远程管理。
语法
说明

trans-unit.source: The **Set-WSManQuickConfig** cmdlet configures the computer to receive Windows PowerShell remote commands that are sent by using the Web Services for Management (WS-Management) technology.
trans-unit.target: **Set-wsmanquickconfig** cmdlet 可以将配置为接收使用 Web 服务，以管理 (Ws-management) 技术发送的 Windows PowerShell 远程命令的计算机。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 将执行以下操作︰

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the WinRM service is running.
trans-unit.target: 检查 WinRM 服务是否正在运行。

trans-unit.source: If the WinRM service is not running, the service is started.
trans-unit.target: 如果 WinRM 服务未运行，则启动该服务。

trans-unit.source: Sets the WinRM service startup type to automatic.
trans-unit.target: 将 WinRM 服务启动类型设置为自动。

trans-unit.source: Creates a listener to accept requests on any IP address.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个侦听器以接受任何 IP 地址上的请求。

trans-unit.source: By default, the transport is HTTP.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，传输为 HTTP。

trans-unit.source: Enables a firewall exception for WinRM traffic .
trans-unit.target: 使 WinRM 通信的防火墙例外。

trans-unit.source: To run this cmdlet, start Windows PowerShell by using the Run as administrator option.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此 cmdlet，请使用运行以管理员身份选项启动 Windows PowerShell。
示例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Enable remote management of the local computer over HTTP
trans-unit.target: 示例 1︰ 通过 HTTP 启用本地计算机的远程管理

trans-unit.source: This command sets the required configuration to enable remote management of the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令设置所需的配置以启用本地计算机的远程管理。

trans-unit.source: By default, this command creates a WS-Management listener on HTTP.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此命令会在 HTTP 上创建 WS-Management 侦听器。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Enable remote management of the local computer over HTTPS
trans-unit.target: 示例 2︰ 启用通过 HTTPS 的本地计算机远程管理

trans-unit.source: The command sets the required configuration to enable remote management of the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 该命令设置所需的配置以启用本地计算机的远程管理。

trans-unit.source: The *UseSSL* parameter makes the command create a WS-Management listener on HTTPS.
trans-unit.target: *UseSSL* 参数使该命令在 HTTPS 上创建 Ws-management 侦听器。
参数
-Force

trans-unit.source: Forces the command to run without asking for user confirmation.
trans-unit.target: 强制运行命令而不要求用户确认。
-SkipNetworkProfileCheck

trans-unit.source: Configures client versions of Windows for remoting when the computer is on a public network.
trans-unit.target: 当计算机位于公用网络上时，配置 Windows 的客户端版本以供远程处理。

trans-unit.source: This parameter enables a firewall rule for public networks that allows remote access only from computers in the same local subnet.
trans-unit.target: 此参数只允许为公用网络启用防火墙规则，该规则只允许远程访问同一本地子网中的计算机。

trans-unit.source: This parameter has no effect on server versions of Windows, which, by default, have a local subnet firewall rule for public networks.
trans-unit.target: 此参数对 Windows 的服务器版本不起作用，这些版本在默认情况下具有适用于公用网络的本地子网防火墙规则。

trans-unit.source: If the local subnet firewall rule is disabled on a server version of Windows, Enable-PSRemoting re-enables it, regardless of the value of this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Windows 的服务器版本上禁用了本地子网防火墙规则，Enable-psremoting 将重新启用它，而不考虑此参数的值。

trans-unit.source: To remove the local subnet restriction and enable remote access from all locations on public networks, use the Set-NetFirewallRule cmdlet in the **NetSecurity** module.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除本地子网限制并允许从公用网络上的所有位置的远程访问，使用中的 Set-netfirewallrule cmdlet **NetSecurity** 模块。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 已在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入了此参数。
-UseSSL

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocol is used to establish a connection to the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 指定安全套接字层 (SSL) 协议用于建立与远程计算机的连接。

trans-unit.source: By default, SSL is not used.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，不使用 SSL。

trans-unit.source: WS-Management encrypts all the Windows PowerShell content that is transmitted over the network.
trans-unit.target: WS-Management 对通过网络传输的所有 Windows PowerShell 内容进行加密。

trans-unit.source: The *UseSSL* parameter lets you specify the additional protection of HTTPS instead of HTTP.
trans-unit.target: *UseSSL* 参数用于指定 HTTPS 而不是 HTTP 的额外保护。

trans-unit.source: If SSL is not available on the port that is used for the connection, and you specify this parameter, the command fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果 SSL 不可用的端口上用于该连接，并指定此参数，该命令将失败。
CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。
有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。
输入
无

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not accept any input.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 不接受任何输入。
输出
无

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 将不生成任何输出。
说明
